I see that some games on the TextAdventures site are available for phones, & others are not. How can I make sure mine also works on the phone? Or are there more advanced steps required to accomplish this?

[quote="Alex":2ieenecr]Stand by for a proper announcement, but basically QuestJS is deprecated at this point - I'm not planning to improve it or fix anything. Instead, I'm actually working on a proper JavaScript runtime for Quest games, which will become the way that all Quest games work - the browser will load and run the .aslx or .quest file natively and do all the work there. That means wrapping it up into an app or putting it on Steam or whatever will become much easier.[/quote:2ieenecr]

I'm assuming it's tricky, but in some time to come it'll be made much easier ? Can I get a link to somewhere explaining the current procedures (if there is one) ?
